mapper.insert: insert into comments(comment_no, board_no, user_no, user_id, content, regdate) values(cmt_seq.nextval, #{board_no}, #{user_no}, #{user_id}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from comments where board_no = #{board_no} order by regdate asc
mapper.delete: delete from comments where comment_no = #{ comment_no }
mapper.select: select c.comment_no, c.board_no, c.user_no, c.user_id, c.content, c.regdate, b.subject as board_subject from comments c join board b on c.board_no = b.board_no where c.user_no = #{user_no} order by c.regdate asc
